section.section: Except as provided in paragraph (3) of this subsection, the term of a member is 3 years.
The terms of members are staggered as required by the terms provided for members of the review board on October 1, 1984.
In Charles County, the term of a member is 4 years.
At the end of a term, a member continues to serve until a successor is appointed and qualifies.
A member who is appointed after a term has begun serves only for the rest of the term and until a successor is appointed and qualifies.
